remarks: Value of the leading coefficient sequence function.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Mar-2015.)
statement:

hbtlem1 $p |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. U /\ X e. NN0 ) -> ( ( S ` I ) ` X ) = { j | E. k e. I ( ( D ` k ) <_ X /\ j = ( ( coe1 ` k ) ` X ) ) } ) $.
$d I j k $.
$d R j k $.
